resources.string:
Open any text field and select barcode keyboard as an input method, then scan any QR code.

Built by Raphael Michel

Released under Apache License 2.0

Based on the barcodescanner-view project by dm77 (Apache License 2.0) and the ZXing project by Google (Apache License 2.0).

Source code at https://github.com/raphaelm/android-barcode-keyboard
Camera permission is required for barcode scanning
